remarks: Group homomorphism depends only on the group attributes of structures. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
ghmpropd.a $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` J ) ) $.
ghmpropd.b $e |- ( ph -> C = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
ghmpropd.c $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
ghmpropd.d $e |- ( ph -> C = ( Base ` M ) ) $.
ghmpropd.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` J ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` L ) y ) ) $.
ghmpropd.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. C /\ y e. C ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` K ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` M ) y ) ) $.
ghmpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( J GrpHom K ) = ( L GrpHom M ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d ph x y $.
